document.topic_text: Man barricades himself overnight in St. Pete Barricaded man now in custody WTSP 6:40 AM. EST April 25, 2016 Man barricade himself overnight in St. Pete CONNECT TWEET PINTEREST A man was arrested in St. Pete after getting into a domestic dispute, firing a shot, and barricading himself in a home. Fabian Williams was arguing with his partner early Monday morning when he fired a shot and fled to his neighbor's home. The partner was uninjured and Williams was barricaded with his 6-year-old son. Police evacuated some nearby homes until Williams came out of the home around 3 a.m. Williams faces charges of domestic aggravated assault, felony possession of a firearm , felon in possession of ammunition, and child abuse.
